revised_title: Stress Systems in an Infinite Strip: A Comprehensive Solution
tldr: The authors present a comprehensive solution for stress systems in an infinite strip, using stress functions and Fourier integrals. They provide a general solution for forces acting on the edges of the strip and a specific solution for a force acting at any point within the strip. The solution satisfies the boundary conditions and can be used to calculate stresses and displacements in various scenarios.
